rows.label: qev055501_MSG0001
rows.name: Ah, perfect. I am glad that I waited.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0002
rows.name:
You are the one who will complete any task no matter
how difficult, are you not? I heard stories of your valor
from the other residents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0003
rows.name:
Lately, it has become difficult to ascertain the will of my
Ovah. It is quite the predicament.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_JNK0010
rows.name: Ask about Ovah[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_SEL0011
rows.name: Inquire if that's something that happens to Orpheans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_JNK0020
rows.name: Ask about Causes[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask if Nan'celeg has any idea why this is happening.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0004
rows.name:
It is not completely unheard of, and one's environment
and circumstances can be major factors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0005
rows.name:
Also, in the course of decline due to old age,
some Orpheans go berserk and must be...subdued.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0006
rows.name:
Thankfully, I am still young.
That ought not be an issue.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0007
rows.name:
Hmm... Well, it began when I moved to New LA.
Perhaps the cause lies there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0008
rows.name: Still, that is far from a concrete diagnosis.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0009
rows.name: I plan to begin a trial treatment presently.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0010
rows.name:
The procedure is a simple administration of lumenoa
leaf, a Miran herb.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0011
rows.name:
It is a method I came across in a database while
working as a researcher for the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0012
rows.name: Can I ask you to locate and harvest that herb for me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0013
rows.name:
My research shows that the herb can be found on the
Far Isle of Tzu'o in Cauldros.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0014
rows.name:
I am confident you will fulfill my request most
satisfactorily. You have my thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0015
rows.name:
The herb should be found growing on the Far Isle of
Tzu'o in Cauldros.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0016
rows.name:
I am certain that will clear my condition right up.
I thank you for the help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0017
rows.name:
Ah, yes. I have been waiting for you.
Have you acquired the herb I requested?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0018
rows.name: Thank you. *chomp* *chew* *munch*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0019
rows.name:
Oh... Oh my word! That is quite effective!
Already I feel the will of my Ovah more clearly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0020
rows.name: ...What? But...has the time for that truly come?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0021
rows.name:
Had I become so deaf that I could not hear something
so important?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_JNK0030
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask what Nan'celeg heard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_JNK0040
rows.name: Ignore[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_SEL0041
rows.name: Pay no attention to Nan'celeg.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0053
rows.name:
When the time comes, the Orphe reproduce by
dividing their bodies in two.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0054
rows.name: My Ovah is telling me that now is my time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0055
rows.name: I must divide as soon as possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0058
rows.name:
There is no time to waste...
I will divide at once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0061
rows.name: Ngh...gggah! RrrrrrrrRAH![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0064
rows.name:
Who are you?
How has an Orphean like you emerged from me?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0067
rows.name: Who...who am I? Why am I in such a place as this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0068
rows.name:
This is not my home... The forest...
I must return to the forest![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0070
rows.name: What in the world...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0071
rows.name:
When dividing, the resultant new life should be
essentially identical to the parent body.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0072
rows.name: But I have never seen an Orphean that looked like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0073
rows.name:
And it seemed terribly confused, as well.
Almost as if it was unable to hear the Ovah's will.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_JNK0050
rows.name: Worry[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_SEL0051
rows.name: Express concern for the Orphean who ran off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_JNK0060
rows.name: Guess[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_SEL0061
rows.name: Suggest that it may have been a spontaneous mutation.

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0080
rows.name: Yes, of course. This situation demands swift action.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0083
rows.name: Yes, that is certainly a logical conjecture.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0084
rows.name:
It would have to be the result of some environmental
factor on Mira, for nothing like it was ever seen on
our homeworld.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0085
rows.name:
In any case, we must hurry. We will gain no answers
save by speaking to it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0088
rows.name:
I can say with 89.6 percent certainty that it headed for
Noctilum. Could I ask you to bring it back here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0089
rows.name:
I fear the aftereffects of division have left me exhausted.
I am not fit to join you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0090
rows.name:
Please hurry. In such a new and confused state,
the poor Orphean will make easy prey for any
primordial creature it happens to meet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0025
rows.name: That division looked nothing at all like me...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0026
rows.name:
Its red color... The shape of its antennae...
I have never seen an Orphean like it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0027
rows.name:
We must speak with it if we hope to obtain any
answers. Please hurry to Noctilum and bring it
back here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0028
rows.name:
It looks nothing like me...and I am beginning to
understand why.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0029
rows.name:
This division was born here in the city,
after extensive contact with humans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0030
rows.name:
The Orphe are not separated into distinct sexes like you
humans. Instead, we are all alike.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0031
rows.name:
...Save for this one. It is an entirely new type born
from the both of us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0032
rows.name:
New, old—none of that makes any difference to me.
What I could really use is a name![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_JNK0110
rows.name: Scold[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_SEL0111
rows.name:
Chide Nan'celeg for treating his
child like a research subject.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_JNK0120
rows.name: Comfort[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_SEL0121
rows.name: Calm the Orphean's anger with gentle assurance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0033
rows.name:
Y-yes, of course. Forgive me.
I was wrong to refer to you as an "it."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0034
rows.name:
I accept your apology—but you are still my parent,
and so must give me a name.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0035
rows.name:
You saved my life. If my agitation offends you,
I will be quiet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0036
rows.name:
But having no name is painful to me.
You are my parent—please give me my name.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0037
rows.name: As my division, your name would be Nen'celeg.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0038
rows.name: Then that shall be my name.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0039
rows.name:
Now I can finally introduce myself properly.
...I am Nen'celeg. Thank you for saving me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0040
rows.name:
This is a humble thanks from us. ...Come now!
Hurry up and give [ST:gender p1=him p2=her ] a reward.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0041
rows.name:
You have been a great help.
Please accept this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0042
rows.name:
Now that all this has been taken care of,
you have much to teach me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055501_MSG0043
rows.name: Of course. It is my responsibility as your parent.[ST:wait ]
